title: Remove Non ASCII Characters
description: In this lab, we will explore the world of JavaScript programming and learn how to use it to build dynamic and interactive web applications. Through a series of hands-on exercises and coding challenges, we will cover topics such as variables, data types, functions, control flow, and more. By the end of the lab, you will have a solid understanding of the fundamentals of JavaScript programming and be ready to take your skills to the next level.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
